snippet: More than 70 doctors and medical experts, worried about injuries, sent an open letter to the government calling for tackling to be banned in school matches.
abstract: Open letter to British government from dozens of medical experts recommends banning of tackling in school rugby matches.
lead_paragraph: More than 70 doctors and medical experts, worried about injuries, sent an open letter to the government calling for tackling to be banned in school matches.

headline.main: A Call to Ban Tackling in British Rugby
